plugin.name: ðŸ§¹ Task Sweeper
plugin.description:
Move Overdue Tasks to selected date. This plugin also adds template functionality to sweep still-open tasks from project notes and previous calendar days into a template file. 
{{sweepTasks({limit:{ unit: day, num: 7 },includeHeadings:false})}}
plugin.author: Naman Goel & Eduard & dwertheimer

plugin.commands.name: swt
plugin.commands.description: Move/Reschedule all open tasks in current note to today's Calendar Note

plugin.commands.name: swa
plugin.commands.description: Find ALL open tasks & move/reschedule to today's Calendar Note

plugin.commands.name: sw7
plugin.commands.description: Find all open tasks for last 7 days & silently move/reschedule to today
